location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Sketch Map showing Flow of Flood Water, February-March 1938'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed in colour on paperDimensions: 255 x 305mm, on sheet 306 x 344mm

mods.abstract: A map of the area around the Shaṭṭ al-‘Arab estuary in Iran, including mud flats and marshland. The map gives hydrological information and shows settlements, railways, pipelines, and roads. The map was produced by the General Staff India and includes a printing statement which reads 'Survey Section No. 827 May 1940--80'. The map is marked secret (copy no. 0006) and is Map No. 6 from the volume 'Military Report on the Anglo-Iranian Oil Company's (South Iranian) Oilfield Area'.
